p: The biological activity scales for the ligands of medicinal plants and standard drugs were predicted by using the Prediction of Activity Spectra for Substances (PASS) program (Filimonov et al., 2014). Briefly, the Canonical SMILES of ligands were used in the PASS-Way2Drug server ( http://www.pharmaexpert.ru/passonline/) to predict the probability to be active (Pa) and the probability of becoming inactive (Pi). The bioactivity score (BAS) for the selected bioactives from medicinal plants and standard drugs was predicted using Molinspiration web-based tool ( http://www.molinspiration.com/cgi-bin/properties). This web-based tool provides BAS against human receptors and protein molecules like GPCRs, ion channels, nuclear receptors, proteases and kinases.
